subtitles.transcript: The county health team, and other people who used to come and sensitize, they couldn’t speak our dialect.
They were not part of our religion and  culture and tradition.
You’re talking to people about serious business. If you are dancing, that means it’s serious?
You’re talking about, “Don’t do this and if you do that you will die.”
You’re telling somebody that at the same time you are dancing?
They will not take it to be true.
